---
title: "R Workshop"
---

The R workshop is aimed at people who are already familiar with R and RStudio. You can choose to use either RStudio Desktop or [RStudio Cloud](https://rstudio.cloud/) to run the code examples. 

::: callout-important
**Please read the [Code of Conduct](/code-of-conduct.qmd), [FAQ](/faq.qmd), and [Setting up](/rdocs/r01-setup.qmd) before joining the workshop.**
:::
